get.description:
Profile for SNMP configuration.
SNMP user-table, trap receivers, community strings,
notify groups, targets, etc. can be configured.
Both Informs and Traps are supported.
Handles configuration for SNMP v1, v2c, v3 versions.

post.summary: Create a new SNMP profile by unique profile name
post.description: SNMP profile to configure SNMP parameters.

get.description: SNMP profile to configure SNMP parameters.

patch.description: SNMP profile to configure SNMP parameters.

delete.description: SNMP profile to configure SNMP parameters.

delete_object_type.name: object_type
delete_object_type.description: LOCAL - To delete local objects. SHARED - To delete shared objects. Default - Defaults to SHARED if not provided

delete_scope_id.name: scope_id
delete_scope_id.description: Scope at which local object needs to be deleted. Mandatory if object_type = LOCAL. Should not be provided for object_type = SHARED.

delete_persona.name: persona
delete_persona.description: Persona for which the local object needs to be deleted. Mandatory if object_type = LOCAL. Should not be provided for object_type = SHARED.

post_object_type.name: object_type
post_object_type.description: LOCAL - To create local objects. SHARED - To create shared objects. Default - Defaults to SHARED if not provided

post_scope_id.name: scope_id
post_scope_id.description: Scope at which local object needs to be created. Mandatory if object_type = LOCAL. Should not be provided for object_type = SHARED.

post_persona.name: persona
post_persona.description: Persona for which the local object needs to be created. Mandatory if object_type = LOCAL. Should not be provided for object_type = SHARED.

patch_object_type.name: object_type
patch_object_type.description: LOCAL - To update local objects. SHARED - To update shared objects. Default - Defaults to SHARED if not provided

patch_scope_id.name: scope_id
patch_scope_id.description: Scope at which local object needs to be updated. Mandatory if object_type = LOCAL. Should not be provided for object_type = SHARED.

patch_persona.name: persona
patch_persona.description: Persona for which the local object needs to be updated. Mandatory if object_type = LOCAL. Should not be provided for object_type = SHARED.

get_object_type.name: object_type
get_object_type.description: Retrieves LOCAL or SHARED or both(default) configuration objects.

get_scope_id.name: scope_id
get_scope_id.description: Configuration at a given scope. Mandatory for view_type = LOCAL.

get_persona.name: persona
get_persona.description: Filters configuration specific to given persona type. If not provided and view_type = LOCAL, then defaults to all persona.

effective.name: effective
effective.description: True - Returns effective configuration (i.e hierarchically merged configuration). False - Returns committed configuration at a given scope.

detailed.name: detailed
detailed.description: True - Includes annotations in the returned json to indicate the type of object, scope, and persona. False - Returns only config objects without annotations.

view_type.name: view_type
view_type.description: LIBRARY - Returns shared objects in library. For LIBRARY, all other parameters listed below, except 'detailed' , will be ignored. LOCAL - Returns configurations for a scope and one or more persona based on parameters below.

schema.description: The number of requests left for the time window.

X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: The number of requests left for the time window.

schema.description: The UTC date/time at which the current rate limit window resets.

X-RateLimit-Reset.description: The UTC date/time at which the current rate limit window resets.

ArubaSnmp_SnmpSchema.description:
Profile for SNMP configuration.
SNMP user-table, trap receivers, community strings,
notify groups, targets, etc. can be configured.
Both Informs and Traps are supported.
Handles configuration for SNMP v1, v2c, v3 versions.

profile.description: SNMP profile to configure SNMP parameters.

trap-enable.description: To enable SNMP traps in system. By default traps are enabled.

inform-queue-length.description: To set inform queue length. By default inform queue length set to 250.

enable-snmpv3-only.description: Enables only the SNMPv3 mode of operation and disallows SNMP v1 and v2c.

agent-port.x-typeDescription:
A 16-bit port number used by a transport protocol such as TCP
or UDP.

oneOf.x-typeDescription:
An IPv4 address in dotted quad notation using the default
zone.

An IPv6 address represented as either a full address; shortened
or mixed-shortened formats, using the default zone.

x-enumDescriptions.DEST_IP_ADDRESS:
The destination ip address of the SNMP request is used
as the source IP address in the SNMP response.
x-enumDescriptions.LOOPBACK:
For the specified loopback interface, lexicographically
minimum configured ip address will be used as the source
ip address in the snmp response pdu.

response-source.description: Source IP address of the SNMP response PDU.

snmp-source-controller-ip.description: On enabling this parameter source address of SNMP responses will be set to Controller IP.

oneOf.x-typeDescription:
An IPv4 address in dotted quad notation using the default
zone.

An IPv6 address represented as either a full address; shortened
or mixed-shortened formats, using the default zone.

x-enumDescriptions.DEST_IP_ADDRESS:
The destination ip address of the SNMP request is used
as the source IP address in the SNMP response.
x-enumDescriptions.LOOPBACK:
For the specified loopback interface, lexicographically
minimum configured ip address will be used as the source
ip address in the snmp response pdu.

trap-source.description:
Source address of SNMP notification responses.
Only ip-address type is supported for gateways

x-enumDescriptions.MANAGEMENT_INTERFACE: Enable SNMP Server on Management Interface only.
x-enumDescriptions.DATA: Enable SNMP Server on Data Plane only.
x-enumDescriptions.BOTH: Enable SNMP Server on both OOBM and Data planes.

community.description: SNMP community associated with this context.

vrf.x-typeDescription: Type definition for 'name', should be alphanumeric. Special characters such as '\', '/' and space are not allowed.
vrf.description: The VRF associated with this context.

view-name-oid-tree-mask.description: The key combination consists of the SNMP view name, OID tree, and mask, separated by '~'. If the mask is empty, use 'EMPTY' as its value.

x-enumDescriptions.INCLUDE: MIB subtree included in SNMP view.
x-enumDescriptions.EXCLUDE: MIB subtree excluded in SNMP view.

type.description:
INCLUDE - Include an OID tree.
EXCLUDE - Exclude an OID tree.

access-level.description:
ro - read-only access for SNMP community.
rw - read-write access for SNMP community.

policy-ipv4.description: IPv4 policy associated with this community string.

policy-ipv6.description: IPv6 policy associated with this community string.

x-enumDescriptions.MANAGER: manager level access for snmp user.
x-enumDescriptions.OPERATOR: operator level access for snmp user.

auth-protocol.description:
Auth Protocols supported for SNMP user.
Range for AP: MD5 and SHA.

auth-password.x-typeDescription:
A custom derived type for special use cases. This type takes a plaintext password and uses
Vault's 3rd party API to encrypt the password. The intended use case is to encrypt and store
customer credentials which will be used later to login to 3rd party services.
auth-password.description: Auth Protocol Password. This parameter to be configured along with auth-protocol.

auth-pass-text.description: Authentication and privacy-protocol password text format

privacy-protocol.description:
Privacy Protocols supported for SNMP user.
Range for AP: DES and AES.

privacy-password.x-typeDescription:
A custom derived type for special use cases. This type takes a plaintext password and uses
Vault's 3rd party API to encrypt the password. The intended use case is to encrypt and store
customer credentials which will be used later to login to 3rd party services.
privacy-password.description: Privacy Protocol Password. This parameter to be configured along with privacy-protocol.

access-level.description:
ro - read-only access for snmpv3 user.
rw - read-write access for snmpv3 user.

x-enumDescriptions.MANAGER: manager level access for snmp user.
x-enumDescriptions.OPERATOR: operator level access for snmp user.

auth-required.description: Authentication required for user to communicate.

privacy-required.description: Privacy required for user to communicate.

remote-user.description: List of users on a remote SNMP engine who receives the inform notifications.

engine-id-username.description: Key combination of engine-id and username separated by ~

engine-id.x-typeDescription: Engine ID of SNMP host in HEX eg. 8000052301A9FEA484.
engine-id.description: Engine id of the remote system for V3 informs.

username.description: The user name that receives inform notifications on a remote device.

auth-protocol.description: Auth protocols supported for SNMP inform notifications.

auth-password.x-typeDescription:
A custom derived type for special use cases. This type takes a plaintext password and uses
Vault's 3rd party API to encrypt the password. The intended use case is to encrypt and store
customer credentials which will be used later to login to 3rd party services.
auth-password.description: Auth protocol password for SNMP inform notifications.

privacy-protocol.description: Privacy protocols supported for SNMP inform notifications.

privacy-password.x-typeDescription:
A custom derived type for special use cases. This type takes a plaintext password and uses
Vault's 3rd party API to encrypt the password. The intended use case is to encrypt and store
customer credentials which will be used later to login to 3rd party services.
privacy-password.description: Privacy protocol password for SNMP inform notifications.

restricted-access.description: Enable SNMPv1 and SNMPv2c access properties.

items.x-typeDescription: Type definition for 'name', should be alphanumeric. Special characters such as '\', '/' and space are not allowed.
items.description: The VRF on which SNMP server is enabled.

notification-receiver.description: List of SNMP Notification receivers (traps or informs).

host-port-version-receiver-name-vrf.description: Key combination of host,port,version and receiver-name separated by ~

management-interface.description: Enable management port usage for SNMP notification receiver.

x-enumDescriptions.NOTINFO: Only critical, warn and debug level log events.

trap-level.description: Trap level used for logging events to notification receiver.

inform.description:
Acknowledgement will be received from SNMP server for inform notification type.
If inform is not set, notifcation type is trap.
This parameter is applicable for v2c & v3 version host only.

interval.description: Inform retry interval duration in seconds.

retrycount.description: Number of retries to this host before giving up on the Inform.

host-engineid.x-typeDescription: Engine ID of SNMP host in HEX eg. 8000052301A9FEA484.
host-engineid.description:
Engine ID of SNMP notification host.
This parameter is applicable for v3 trap host type only.

vrf.x-typeDescription: Type definition for 'name', should be alphanumeric. Special characters such as '\', '/' and space are not allowed.
vrf.description: The VRF associated with this trap-source.

vrf.x-typeDescription: Type definition for 'name', should be alphanumeric. Special characters such as '\', '/' and space are not allowed.
vrf.description: The VRF associated with this trap-source.

vrrp-id.description:
VRRP instance ID. This enables to use VRRP IP address
as source address in SNMP traps.
Only VRRP-ID or IP address as SNMP trap-source can be configured and not both.

ANY.description: Any of local or shared config object.

trap-enable.description: To enable SNMP traps in system. By default traps are enabled.

inform-queue-length.description: To set inform queue length. By default inform queue length set to 250.

enable-snmpv3-only.description: Enables only the SNMPv3 mode of operation and disallows SNMP v1 and v2c.

agent-port.x-typeDescription:
A 16-bit port number used by a transport protocol such as TCP
or UDP.

oneOf.x-typeDescription:
An IPv4 address in dotted quad notation using the default
zone.

An IPv6 address represented as either a full address; shortened
or mixed-shortened formats, using the default zone.

x-enumDescriptions.DEST_IP_ADDRESS:
The destination ip address of the SNMP request is used
as the source IP address in the SNMP response.
x-enumDescriptions.LOOPBACK:
For the specified loopback interface, lexicographically
minimum configured ip address will be used as the source
ip address in the snmp response pdu.

response-source.description: Source IP address of the SNMP response PDU.

snmp-source-controller-ip.description: On enabling this parameter source address of SNMP responses will be set to Controller IP.

An IPv4 address in dotted quad notation using the default
zone.

An IPv6 address represented as either a full address; shortened
or mixed-shortened formats, using the default zone.

x-enumDescriptions.DEST_IP_ADDRESS:

x-enumDescriptions.LOOPBACK:
For the specified loopback interface, lexicographically
minimum configured ip address will be used as the source
ip address in the snmp response pdu.

trap-source.description:
Source address of SNMP notification responses.
Only ip-address type is supported for gateways

x-enumDescriptions.MANAGEMENT_INTERFACE: Enable SNMP Server on Management Interface only.
x-enumDescriptions.DATA: Enable SNMP Server on Data Plane only.
x-enumDescriptions.BOTH: Enable SNMP Server on both OOBM and Data planes.

vrf.description: The VRF associated with this context.

items.description: The VRF on which SNMP server is enabled.

x-enumDescriptions.NOTINFO: Only critical, warn and debug level log events.

trap-level.description: Trap level used for logging events to notification receiver.

inform.description:
Acknowledgement will be received from SNMP server for inform notification type.
If inform is not set, notifcation type is trap.

vrf.description: The VRF associated with this trap-source.

ArubaSnmp_InterfaceGroup.description: SNMP trap and response source interface

source-ipv4.x-typeDescription:
An IPv4 address in dotted quad notation using the default
zone.

source-ipv6.x-typeDescription:
An IPv6 address represented as either a full address; shortened
or mixed-shortened formats, using the default zone.

vlan-interface.x-typeDescription: Type definition representing a single-tagged VLAN

oneOf.x-typeDescription:
An IPv4 address in dotted quad notation using the default
zone.

An IPv6 address represented as either a full address; shortened
or mixed-shortened formats, using the default zone.

address-mask.x-typeDescription:
An IPv4 address in dotted quad notation using the default
zone.
address-mask.description: SNMPv3 range of target addresses with this mask.

x-enumDescriptions.NOTINFO: Only critical, warn and debug level log events.

udp-port.x-typeDescription:
A 16-bit port number used by a transport protocol such as TCP
or UDP.
udp-port.description: UDP port number to which the messages are sent.

items.x-typeDescription:
A 16-bit port number used by a transport protocol such as TCP
or UDP.
items.description: Range of UDP ports to which the messages are sent.

retries.description: Number of times a notification is retransmitted if no response is received.

management-interface.description: Use the Management interface to send notification.

group-name-user.description: Key combination of group-name and user separated by ~

snmp-version.description: SNMPv3 version associated with this group.

x-enumDescriptions.ALLOW: Allow the unsecured access to this MIB.
x-enumDescriptions.BLOCK: Block the unsecured access to this MIB.

macsecmib.description: SNMP access restrictions for the hpicfMACsec MIB

x-enumDescriptions.INCLUDE: MIB subtree included in SNMP view.
x-enumDescriptions.EXCLUDE: MIB subtree excluded in SNMP view.

switchauthmib.description: SNMP access restrictions for the switchauthmib MIB

x-enumDescriptions.ALLOW: Allow the unsecured access to this MIB.
x-enumDescriptions.BLOCK: Block the unsecured access to this MIB.

ieee8021mib.description: SNMP access restrictions for the ieee8021mib MIB

user.description: SNMPv3 user associated with this param.

version.description: SNMPv3 version associated with this param.

msg-processing.description: SNMPv3 message processing associated with this param.

x-enumDescriptions.NO_AUTH_NO_PRIV: No authentication and no data encryption.

method.x-typeDescription: SNMP authentication and data encryption security level.

Successful200.description: Success response returned from the server.

Error400.description: Error details returned from the server.

message.example: Bad request. Invalid values supplied in request.

Error401.description: Error details returned from the server.

Error403.description: Error details returned from the server.

Error404.description: Error details returned from the server.

message.example: Not found. Yang / Corresponding Rule is missing.

Error406.description: Error details returned from the server.

Error408.description: Error details returned from the server.

Error412.description: Error details returned from the server.

Error429.description: Error details returned from the server.

Error500.description: Error details returned from the server.
